data.description: NXP Semiconductors NV is a holding company which engages in the provision of semiconductor solutions. The company is headquartered in Eindhoven, Noord-Brabant and currently employs 33,100 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2010-08-06. The firm through its subsidiaries focuses on the design, development, and manufacturing of semiconductor products used in a wide range of applications across automotive, industrial, mobile, and communication infrastructure markets. NXP Semiconductors discloses its revenue by end-markets. Automotive includes products for vehicle control, safety, infotainment, and electrification; Industrial & Internet of Things (IoT) covers applications in smart home, smart city, and industrial automation. The firm has one reportable segment representing the entity as a whole, it reflects the operating decisions and allocation of resources of the Company.
data.naics: Semiconductor and Other Electronic Component Manufacturing
data.name: NXP Semiconductors NV
